content: Is there code for saying that if the direction of some affine subspace S is \bot then then S = \bot? Basically I'm looking for something that goes "the other way" from docs#AffineSubspace.direction_bot. The docstring for docs#AffineSubspace.direction seems to suggest that this is the case, but I can't find any proof of it.
We don't have that result because it's (mostly) false; an affine space can contain a single point, which has direction bot but it's itself bot.
Ricardo Prado Cunha has marked this topic as resolved.
